p: The data were gathered by searching the English articles in PubMed, Scopus, Google Scholar, and Web of Science. The keywords used as search terms were ‘ Rosmarinus officinalis’, ‘rosemary’, ‘nervous system’, ‘depression’, ‘memory’, ‘Alzheimer’s disease’ ‘epilepsy’, ‘addiction’, and ‘neuropathic pain’. All kinds of related articles, abstracts and books were included. No time limitation was considered in this review. Both in vitro and in vivo studies were subjected to this investigation.
